phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Now that my arms are better, I need to make up for all the time I have lost!
It appeared as though peaceful days had returned to the Black Bulls.
Man, there have not been any incidents lately.
But a single mage destroyed it all.
All right, all eyes up here.
He was called the Captain of the Black Bulls,
and for some reason, he was wearing a happi coat.
So, yeah, there is a festival happening.
What is this festival all about?!
To put it simply, it is a friggin' awesome festival!
That was a bit too simple.
Finral, explain this festival in more detail.
As you all know, the Wizard King awards stars
to Magic Knights Squads to recognize their achievements.
All of the squads compete to see who can get the most stars.
Then they announce the number of stars won in a year
and determine the top squad for that year.
That is what this festival is.
Let us shoot for number one!
Considering how much trouble our squad causes each year,
I am sure we are always fighting for last place.

Last Year's Star Numbers 1: Golden Dawn 96 2: Crimson Lion Kings 93 3: Silver Eagles 88 4: Purple Orcas 74 5: Blue Rose Knights 72 6: Green Praying Mantises 65 7: Aqua Deer 53 8: Coral Peacocks 51 9: Black Bulls -50
We are dead last, without contest.
I mean, we are the only squad in the negative.
We are causing way too much trouble, then!
Also, this festival is held in full view of the public,
and is the biggest, most-loved festival of the year.
Captain Yami is surprisingly into this!
I can never get into this stupid festival, but let us go.
Yet you are dressed like that?
I will go with you, Mister Yami!
Oh, sorry to interrupt, but Finral...
There are some people I would like you to bring with us.
Go live it up, you dumbasses!
There is still time before they announce the rankings!
I am going to go get some food, too.
I wonder what I should get for Marie.
I wonder if there is anyone strong around.
Where did you buy that funny-looking mask?
I wish I could show this to everyone back in Hage!
Do not get so excited that you end up getting lost.
W-Well, I guess I would better go around with you.
I had Finral bring them over.
Always happy to help out one of my adorable juniors.
Now, if you will excuse me, I have got some ka yute girls waiting for me.
So this is what a festival in a surface city is like!
I am already grateful enough that you guys saved the Underwater Temple
from those terrifying Eye of the Midnight Sun guys.
And there is my beautiful goddess!
Kahono, you still cannot talk, so do not get too excited.
I am sure Kahono really wants to sing.
Kiato, did you bring your leg?
We preserved it with water magic.
We got secret witch spells from the Queen of Witches,
and that was one of her healing spells!
I am so happy for you!
Everyone can hear my song again...
I guess now we can strive to be idols again!
I am going to get even better, and then get filthy rich!
Kahono's way more responsible than I am.
Hey, this festival only happens once a year, right?
Let us have a total blast!
Your heart is mine, my beautiful goddess.
It is a cannon to shoot fireworks!
I am going to be shootin' them off once the sun goes down, so you better help me!
Oh, but I am about to go enjoy the festival with them.
You are not going to listen to your senior?
There are two guys... and two girls.
Are you guys going on a d-double date?
Uh, what is this double whatever thing?
Th-That is not it at all!
I certainly will not complain about a date with my beautiful goddess.
I see you still have a problem with being honest.
That means I will just have to...
It is been forever since we have seen each other, so let us all have a blast!
Let us actually make it a double date!
What the heck's about to happen here?!
For Kahono to bring this up...
Does that mean she likes Asta?
She is doing this to bring me and my goddess together.
Your big bro's going to do his best!
What the heck's a double date?!
Let us go have some fun!
Ah, so a double date means having fun!
Goodness, she l-linked arms with him right in front of me!
Shall we dance as we go?
Noelle, if you do not do something, I am going to enjoy this festival with Asta.
If you do not fight and win, your wish will not come true!
Could you write my beloved goddess in mayonnaise for me?
Sir, you have got to use your magical power.
I found this lovely mask that would be perfect for you, my goddess!
I got a prize in the magic gun game!
I got some smaller balls as a consolation prize!
Those two seem like a good match.
Wh-Why do I have to care about something like that?!
My beautiful goddess, a crepe for thee!
Ugh, why are not you even trying, Noelle?
At this rate, I am just getting in the way of your crush.
I guess I will just have to change things up.
I-It is a haunted house, duh!
You seriously do not know anything, do you?
They did not have these things at the festivals in Hage Village.
Places like this are well-known for being extra scary and bringing couples super close!
Otherwise known as the couple establishment factory!
At this rate, I am just going to have to force them together!
K-Kahono, do not leave my side!
I cannot let my goddess see me like this!
Or should I say, cupids of love!
Let us go over this one more time.
You will scare the customers, and then I appear!
I am the most powerful of the Magic Knights, after all!
I am confirmed as the next captain of the Green Praying Mantises!
But I have fallen head over bah-ha for you!
Let us enjoy this night together.
And that is how I am going to get the girl!
So when are these ghosts coming out?
H-How am I supposed to know?
Asta and Noelle should be clinging to each other for dear life right about now.
You guys had the nerve to attack the royal capital again?!
Oh, so they were all fake.
We got kicked out because of you.
You flew off the handle too, you know.
Noelle has to work harder, but Asta's too dense!
I wonder how he really feels about Noelle.
What does Noelle mean to you?
What does she mean to me?
Where the heck are her parents?
I wonder if her parents are peasants who came here to find work.
Peasants cannot even raise their kids properly.
How dare those lousy peasants spoil the Star Festival for us?
Only those who possess strong magical powers can live in the realms above us.
There is prejudice against those who lack magical powers.
Even though we are all human.
I cannot help you if you just keep crying!
Asta the Superman can do anything!
He is tiny, but his voice sure is huge!
He is dumb, but he is bursting with muscles!
He cannot use magic, but he can slash through any spell!
Are you making fun of me?!
He cannot use magic, but there is nothing he cannot do!
Asta the Superman can do anything!
There is nothing he cannot do!
My goddess, behold this dance, which I offer to you!
Kahono, could you use your song magic to broadcast this girl's name to her parents?
How can I ever thank you?
I am glad your mom showed up.
Did not I tell you to stay put?
I am here to work, remember?
My daughter did not offend you in any way, did she?!
She must belong to the House of Silva!
It is rude enough for any peasant to even speak to her!
We are said to have the best magic in this kingdom.
And that is exactly why we should extend a helping hand to everyone.
Being arrogant because you think you are better
than everyone else and looking down on others...
Only those with shallow hearts do that!
You can enjoy the festival too, Emma.
It does not matter if you are a royal, an aristocrat, a commoner, or a peasant!
What does Noelle mean to you?
I like Noelle quite a bit.
Tell him how you really feel!
Where the heck did that come from?!
Asta, did you fly off in consideration for my feelings?
He is so dense, and she just cannot be honest with herself.
I-I thought I was going to die...
I have wanted to settle the score with you for a long time.
As you requested, your big brother is going to end that man's life.
Marie likes that thing a lot lately.
I am going to bring it down.
Oh, this really short, buff kid broke that gun earlier.
I went on a d-date with you, so you would better be grateful, Stupidsta!
Wait, who said it was a date?!
Black Clover, Page 68: Battle to the Death?!
Uh, what are you doing, Captain?
